strapiPost.title: NWA Tech Startup Gratavid Acquired
strapiPost.content:
Fayetteville based tech company Gratavid was recently acquired by London based company Graduway + Gravyty

  • Give and receive: Gratavid is a platform that aids large nonprofits in donor retention through personalized videos from those receiving gifts or donations. The company was founded in 2019 by Will Trapp and has acquired customers such as Habitat for Humanity, Teach for America, United Way, and more.
  • A perfect fit: Both Graduway and Gravyty have very similar platforms to Gratavid, and together the combined entity will serve over 2,500 customers, building stronger relationships with donors.

Read more about the acquisition here.
